channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- greyd_suite

item.title: CVE-2022-2180|2024-08-03T00:32:08.913Z -- unknown -- greyd_suite
item.description: The GREYD.SUITE WordPress theme does not properly validate uploaded custom font packages, and does not perform any authorization or csrf checks, allowing an unauthenticated attacker to upload arbitrary files including php source files, leading to possible remote code execution (RCE).
